title: ibm_resource_key is frequently returning a 404
body:
We are frequently seeing this when using `ibm_resource_key` to create resource key:
```
│ ---
│ id: terraform-25711290
│ summary: |
│   [ERROR] Error retrieving resource key: The resource key cannot be found: crn:v1:bluemix:public:event-notifications:us-south:a/abac0df06b644a9cabc6e44f55b3880e:c6fd8...
